content:
bnjbvr commented on Issue #741:

@xen0n ping? (see previous comment)

xen0n commented on Issue #741:

@bnjbvr

Hi, sorry for the delay. My research focus has since shifted mid-2019 and presently I don't have enough time to rework this on top of the current codebase, unfortunately.

As for whether the has_delay_slot property is target-independent or not, definitely it is encoding-specific; for example, MIPS R6 branches don't have delay slots while their pre-R6 counterparts do. So even treating all branch insns of a target as having the same delay slot property won't work.

eqrion commented on Issue #741:

@bnjbvr

Hi, sorry for the delay. My research focus has since shifted mid-2019 and presently I don't have enough time to rework this on top of the current codebase, unfortunately.

That's not a problem, feel free to open a new PR if you ever take another look at this.
